recipes.title: Moderate vocal stretch with formant preservation
recipes.why: Retains speech-like vowel envelope while stretching timing.

recipes.title: Independent cents retune
recipes.why: Applies precise microtonal offset without tempo change.

recipes.title: Extreme stretch with multistage strategy
recipes.why: PaulStretch-style ambient profile for very large ratios using stochastic phase and onset time-credit controls.

recipes.command: python3 pvxvoc.py speech.wav --target-duration 600 --stretch-mode standard --phase-engine propagate --phase-locking identity --n-fft 8192 --win-length 8192 --hop-size 256 --window hann --normalize peak --peak-dbfs -1 --compressor-threshold-db -30 --compressor-ratio 2.0 --compressor-attack-ms 25 --compressor-release-ms 250 --compressor-makeup-db 4 --limiter-threshold 0.95 --output-dir out --suffix _speech600x
recipes.title: Ultra-smooth speech stretch (600x)
recipes.why: Prefers continuity and intelligibility over texture animation; avoids choppy stochastic artifacts on speech sources.

recipes.title: Auto-profile plan preview
recipes.why: Prints the resolved profile/config plan before long renders.

recipes.title: Multi-resolution fusion stretch
recipes.why: Blends several FFT scales to reduce single-resolution bias on complex program material.

recipes.command: python3 pvxvoc.py long.wav --time-stretch 12 --auto-segment-seconds 0.5 --checkpoint-dir checkpoints --manifest-json reports/run_manifest.json --output-dir out --suffix _long
recipes.title: Checkpointed long render with manifest
recipes.why: Caches segment renders for resume workflows and writes run metadata for reproducibility.

recipes.command: python3 pvxvoc.py mix.wav --transform fft --time-stretch 1.07 --transient-preserve --phase-locking identity --output-dir out --suffix _fft
recipes.title: Default production backend (FFT + transient protection)
recipes.why: Use when you need the fastest and most stable general-purpose phase-vocoder path.

recipes.title: Reference Fourier baseline using explicit DFT mode
recipes.why: Useful for parity checks and controlled transform-comparison experiments.

recipes.title: Prime-size frame experiment with CZT backend
recipes.why: Alternative numerical path for awkward/prime frame sizes when validating edge cases.

recipes.title: DCT timbral compaction for smooth harmonic material
recipes.why: Real-basis coefficients can emphasize envelope-like structure for creative reshaping.

recipes.command: python3 pvxvoc.py snare_loop.wav --transform dst --time-stretch 0.92 --phase-locking off --output-dir out --suffix _dst
recipes.title: DST odd-symmetry color pass
recipes.why: Provides an alternate real-basis artifact profile useful for creative percussive processing.

recipes.title: Hartley real-basis exploratory render
recipes.why: Compares Hartley-domain behavior against complex FFT phase-vocoder output.

recipes.command: for t in fft dft czt dct dst hartley; do python3 pvxvoc.py voice.wav --transform "$t" --time-stretch 1.1 --output-dir out --suffix "_$t"; done
recipes.title: A/B sweep of transform backends from shell loop
recipes.why: Fast listening workflow for selecting the least-artifact transform on your source.

recipes.title: Custom cents map retune
recipes.why: Maps incoming notes to a custom 12-degree microtonal scale.

recipes.command: python3 pvxconform.py solo.wav map_conform.csv --pitch-mode ratio --output-dir out --suffix _conform
recipes.title: Conform CSV with per-segment ratios
recipes.why: Applies timeline-specific time and pitch trajectories from CSV.

recipes.command: python3 pvxvoc.py input.wav --time-stretch 1.25 --stdout | python3 pvxdenoise.py - --reduction-db 10 --stdout | python3 pvxdeverb.py - --strength 0.45 --output-dir out --suffix _clean
recipes.title: Time-stretch -> denoise -> dereverb in one pipe
recipes.why: Single-pass CLI chain for serial DSP in Unix pipes.

recipes.command: python3 pvxmorph.py a.wav b.wav -o - | python3 pvxformant.py - --mode preserve --stdout | python3 pvxunison.py - --voices 5 --detune-cents 8 --output-dir out --suffix _morph_stack
recipes.title: Morph -> formant -> unison
recipes.why: Builds a richer timbre chain with no intermediate files.

recipes.command: python3 HPS-pitch-track.py A.wav | python3 pvxvoc.py B.wav --pitch-follow-stdin --pitch-conf-min 0.75 --pitch-lowconf-mode hold --time-stretch-factor 1.0 --output output.wav
recipes.title: Pitch-follow sidechain map (A controls B)
recipes.why: Tracks F0 contour from source A and applies it as a dynamic pitch-ratio control map on source B.

recipes.title: Integrated loudness targeting with limiter
recipes.why: Combines dynamics and loudness controls in shared mastering chain.

recipes.title: Soft clip and hard safety ceiling
recipes.why: Adds saturation while enforcing a strict final peak ceiling.

recipes.title: Batch stretch over folder
recipes.why: Applies consistent transform to many files with one command.

recipes.title: Dry-run output validation
recipes.why: Checks filename resolution and collisions without writing audio.

recipes.command: python3 scripts_ab_compare.py --input mix.wav --a-args "--time-stretch 1.1 --transform fft" --b-args "--time-stretch 1.1 --transform dct" --out-dir reports/ab --name fft_vs_dct
recipes.title: A/B report generation
recipes.why: Creates JSON/Markdown objective reports for fast algorithm and parameter comparisons.

recipes.command: python3 scripts_benchmark_matrix.py --input mix.wav --transforms fft,dft,dct --windows hann,kaiser --n-ffts 1024,2048 --devices cpu --out-dir reports/bench
recipes.title: Benchmark matrix sweep
recipes.why: Produces reproducible CSV/JSON runtime matrices across transform/window/FFT combinations.

recipes.command: python3 scripts_quality_regression.py --input mix.wav --output out/reg.wav --render-args "--time-stretch 1.2 --transform fft" --baseline-json reports/baseline.json --report-json reports/regression.json
recipes.title: Quality regression check
recipes.why: Compares current renders against baseline objective metrics with configurable tolerances.

recipes.title: VBAP adaptive panning via algorithm dispatcher
recipes.why: Demonstrates algorithm-level spatial module invocation.

recipes.title: Quality metrics on processed speech
recipes.why: Collects objective quality indicators for regression tracking.
